alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 8:28PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ada, east central Payette, northeastern Canyon and southwestern Gem Counties through 915 PM MDT... At 826 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Eagle, or 10 miles northeast of Nampa, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rain, up to half inch hail and winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rain could cause minor flooding. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Eagle, Star and Firebird Speedway around 830 PM MDT. Emmett around 840 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Treasure Valley
